function.description:
Returns a string containing all text extracted from *HTML* node(s) (without any markup).
Any HTML-entities (like the copyright entity) contained in the text will be converted to characters.
*Remark 1:* If the PAGE variable is provided as an input, it tries to look for `body` tag and returns the extracted texts from all `body` child tags on the page.
*Remark 2:* This function supports HTML only content. If you get XML content then you have to use XML plugin for getting the texts.
